gasContract.terms: Please visit www.redenergy.com.au/terms for full T&Cs applicable to this offer.
gasContract.variation: We may vary your rates in line with our Terms and Conditions and in accordance with the Relevant Laws. We will give you written notice of at least 5 business days prior to the variation.

incentives.eligibility: Red will contribute $5 to Breast Cancer Network Australia for each calendar month you are on the Red BCNA Saver gas plan, starting from the date we become responsible for your gas supply.

Offset Gas is certified by Climate Active and is an opt-in natural gas product charged at an additional rate of 0.242 cents per MJ inc GST and may be varied or ended by notice under relevant laws. See www.redenergy.com.au/offset-gas

eligibility.information: This offer is available to residential customers currently within the Ausnet Services Gas Adjoining Central distribution zone. For more information contact 131 806.

gasContract.onExpiryDescription: Your contract is ongoing until it is ended by you or us.
